Deprecated API

Deprecated Classes
org.apache.tapestry.binding.FieldBinding
          To be removed in 2.5 with no replacement. Can be accomplished using OGNL expressions. 
org.apache.tapestry.contrib.informal.InheritInformalAny
            
 

Deprecated Methods
org.apache.tapestry.AbstractPage.beginResponse(IMarkupWriter, IRequestCycle)
          To be removed in 3.1. Implement PageRenderListener instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.AbstractComponent.fireObservedChange(String, boolean)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use Tapestry.fireObservedChange(IComponent, String, boolean) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.AbstractComponent.fireObservedChange(String, byte)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use Tapestry.fireObservedChange(IComponent, String, byte) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.AbstractComponent.fireObservedChange(String, char)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use Tapestry.fireObservedChange(IComponent, String, char) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.AbstractComponent.fireObservedChange(String, double)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use Tapestry.fireObservedChange(IComponent, String, double) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.AbstractComponent.fireObservedChange(String, float)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use Tapestry.fireObservedChange(IComponent, String, float) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.AbstractComponent.fireObservedChange(String, int)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use Tapestry.fireObservedChange(IComponent, String, int) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.AbstractComponent.fireObservedChange(String, long)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use Tapestry.fireObservedChange(IComponent, String, long) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.AbstractComponent.fireObservedChange(String, Object)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use Tapestry.fireObservedChange(IComponent, String, Object) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.AbstractComponent.fireObservedChange(String, short)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use Tapestry.fireObservedChange(IComponent, String, short) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.AbstractComponent.formatString(String, Object)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use AbstractComponent.format(String, Object) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.AbstractComponent.formatString(String, Object[])
          To be removed in 3.1. Use AbstractComponent.format(String, Object[]) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.AbstractComponent.formatString(String, Object, Object)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use AbstractComponent.format(String, Object, Object) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.AbstractComponent.formatString(String, Object, Object, Object)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use AbstractComponent.format(String, Object, Object, Object) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.AbstractComponent.generateAttributes(IMarkupWriter, IRequestCycle)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use AbstractComponent.renderInformalParameters(IMarkupWriter, IRequestCycle) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.AbstractComponent.getChangeObserver()
          To be removed in 3.1; use IPage.getChangeObserver(). 
org.apache.tapestry.IComponent.getString(String)
          To be removed in 3.1, use IComponent.getMessage(String). 
org.apache.tapestry.IRequestCycle.setPage(IPage)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use IRequestCycle.activate(IPage). 
org.apache.tapestry.IRequestCycle.setPage(String)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use IRequestCycle.activate(String). 
 

Deprecated Constructors
org.apache.tapestry.event.ObservedChangeEvent(IComponent, String, boolean)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use ObservedChangeEvent.ObservedChangeEvent(IComponent, String, Object) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.event.ObservedChangeEvent(IComponent, String, byte)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use ObservedChangeEvent.ObservedChangeEvent(IComponent, String, Object) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.event.ObservedChangeEvent(IComponent, String, char)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use ObservedChangeEvent.ObservedChangeEvent(IComponent, String, Object) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.event.ObservedChangeEvent(IComponent, String, double)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use ObservedChangeEvent.ObservedChangeEvent(IComponent, String, Object) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.event.ObservedChangeEvent(IComponent, String, float)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use ObservedChangeEvent.ObservedChangeEvent(IComponent, String, Object) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.event.ObservedChangeEvent(IComponent, String, int)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use ObservedChangeEvent.ObservedChangeEvent(IComponent, String, Object) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.event.ObservedChangeEvent(IComponent, String, long)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use ObservedChangeEvent.ObservedChangeEvent(IComponent, String, Object) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.event.ObservedChangeEvent(IComponent, String, short)
          To be removed in 3.1. Use ObservedChangeEvent.ObservedChangeEvent(IComponent, String, Object) instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.util.pool.Pool(int)
          Use Pool.Pool() instead. 
org.apache.tapestry.util.pool.Pool(int, boolean)
          Use Pool.Pool(boolean) instead.
